summary: The implementation successfully addresses all 7 requirements (REQ-24 through REQ-30) for converting Saanufox to a Progressive Web App. All core PWA files have been created (manifest.json, sw.js, offline.html) and index.html has been properly modified with required meta tags and links. The service worker implements proper caching strategies and respects Internet Identity authentication constraints.

missing_requirements.requirement: Register the service worker in frontend/src/main.tsx after the React app mounts, with proper error handling and console logging for registration success/failure
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not show any modifications to main.tsx. While the file is mentioned in frontend-file-summaries.txt, no actual service worker registration code changes are visible in the provided diff.

hallucinated_features.description: Additional static assets cached in service worker beyond requirement scope
hallucinated_features.reason: The service worker caches multiple specific image assets (hero-banner, video-thumb-1 through video-thumb-6) which were not explicitly requested in the requirements. While this aligns with the general caching strategy, these specific assets go beyond what was specified.

hallucinated_features.description: Dynamic cache implementation with runtime caching
hallucinated_features.reason: The service worker implements a DYNAMIC_CACHE constant and runtime caching logic for newly fetched assets, which goes beyond the specified cache-first and network-first strategies mentioned in REQ-27.
